explanation: [0-0] A man in a white T-shirt sits at a gray table, holding a bottle of yellow liquid in his right hand. An empty glass sits on the table. Behind him, a white paper is stuck to the door, with "TOILET" written on it and a downward arrow below. The wall is blue.

[0-8] The man tries to pour the yellow liquid into the glass, but misses, spilling it on the table. He picks up the glass, takes two sips, but doesn't get anything. He puts the glass back on the table, frowns, and tries again to pour the liquid into the glass, but misses again, spilling it on the table. He picks up the glass, takes a sip, but still doesn't get anything. He puts the glass and the bottle back on the table, scratches his head, opens his mouth, and makes an excited expression. He then picks up an empty glass from the right and places it next to the first glass. Then he picks up the bottle and pours the liquid into the second glass. He then picks up the first glass, takes a sip, still doesn't get anything, puts the glass and the bottle back on the table, opens his mouth wide, and makes a shocked expression.
